Title: Relates to establishing an abatement and exemption from real property taxes for capital improvements to reduce carbon emissions
Summary: Relates to establishing an abatement and exemption from real property taxes for capital improvements to reduce carbon emissions; establishes an energy efficiency improvement board to approve the abatements and exemptions.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to establishing an abatement and exemption from real property taxes for capital improvements to reduce carbon emissions; and to repeal such provisions upon the expiration thereof
